sentences.english: They (China) are mistakenly trying to impose a flawed Monroe Doctrine in their backyard.
sentences.chinese: 中国错误的想在自己的后院实施有缺陷的门罗主义。

sentences.english: " At least, "Monroe Doctrine" is the United States, the important principle of regional hegemony.
sentences.chinese: 至少“门罗主义”是美国的地区霸权主义的重要原则。

sentences.english: Call it the Monroe Doctrine, Chinese style.
sentences.chinese: 有人称之为“中国式的门罗主义“。

sentences.english: "Monroe Doctrine"has become the cornerstone of U.
sentences.chinese: “门罗主义”成为美国外交政策的基石。

sentences.english: Events recently reveal a surprising extension of his Monroe Doctrine.
sentences.chinese: 最近的事态表明，他的门罗主义又有一个惊人的发展。
